title: Environment Configuration and Examples Directory Exclusion

messages.content: Exclude the _EXAMPLES_DELETE_AFTER_EXAMINATION from any and all changes. It will only be used for analysis and reference material. Exclude it from any edits. unless I explicitly ask you to make them.
